text: To Sherlock Holmes she is always the woman.
speaker: A

text:
I have seldom heard him
    mention her under any other name.
speaker: B

text:
In his eyes she eclipses and predominates the
    whole of her sex.
speaker: A

text:
It was not that he felt any emotion akin to love for Irene
    Adler.
speaker: B

text:
All emotions, and that one particularly, were abhorrent to his cold,
    precise but admirably balanced mind.
speaker: A
